description.value:
Worn over clothing, designed to allow for quick access to combat gear. Can take the form of hip packs, holsters, bandoliers, vests, etc. Poor Versions hold 15kg, Common Versions hold 20kg, Good Versions hold 30kg.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
